span.p: This page will contain letters, information, and important links regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19) and its effect on the Washington Township Public Schools. Please check back as we will update the page when new information is available.
In an effort to provide the most timely support to our students and families, please utilize the list of support contacts below:

td.p: Please contact the teacher who assigned the activity.

p.em: -- All families eligible for school meals have been contacted via email and phone. If you did not receive an email or call and believe you should have, please contact fserv2@wtps.org.

br.em: -- All families needing a device or internet have been contact via email and phone. If you need a device or hotspot and have not received one yet, please contact jkonecki@wtps.org or call (856) 589-8500 ext. 7313.
